name: Finset.instNoZeroDivisors
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝³ : DecidableEq α
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : Mul α
inst✝ : NoZeroDivisors α
⊢ NoZeroDivisors (Finset α)
decl:
instance [DecidableEq α] [Zero α] [Mul α] [NoZeroDivisors α] : NoZeroDivisors (Finset α) :=
  Function.Injective.noZeroDivisors toSet coe_injective coe_zero coe_mul

name: Finset.noZeroSMulDivisors
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq β
inst✝³ : Zero α
inst✝² : Zero β
inst✝¹ : SMul α β
inst✝ : NoZeroSMulDivisors α β
⊢ NoZeroSMulDivisors (Finset α) (Finset β)
decl:
instance noZeroSMulDivisors [Zero α] [Zero β] [SMul α β] [NoZeroSMulDivisors α β] :
    NoZeroSMulDivisors (Finset α) (Finset β) where
  eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_smul_eq_zero {s t} := by
    exact_mod_cast eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_smul_eq_zero (c := s.toSet) (x := t.toSet)

name: Finset.noZeroSMulDivisors_finset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq β
inst✝³ : Zero α
inst✝² : Zero β
inst✝¹ : SMul α β
inst✝ : NoZeroSMulDivisors α β
⊢ NoZeroSMulDivisors α (Finset β)
decl:
instance noZeroSMulDivisors_finset [Zero α] [Zero β] [SMul α β] [NoZeroSMulDivisors α β] :
    NoZeroSMulDivisors α (Finset β) :=
  Function.Injective.noZeroSMulDivisors toSet coe_injective coe_zero coe_smul_finset

name: Finset.smul_zero_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulZeroClass α β
s : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HSMul.hSMul s 0) 0
decl: lemma smul_zero_subset (s : Finset α) : s • (0 : Finset β) ⊆ 0 := by simp [subset_iff, mem_smul]

name: Finset.Nonempty.smul_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulZeroClass α β
s : Finset α
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul s 0) 0
decl:
lemma Nonempty.smul_zero (hs : s.Nonempty) : s • (0 : Finset β) = 0 :=
  s.smul_zero_subset.antisymm <| by simpa [mem_smul] using hs

name: Finset.zero_mem_smul_finset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulZeroClass α β
t : Finset β
a : α
h : Membership.mem t 0
⊢ Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a t) 0
decl:
lemma zero_mem_smul_finset (h : (0 : β) ∈ t) : (0 : β) ∈ a • t :=
  mem_smul_finset.2 ⟨0, h, smul_zero _⟩

name: Finset.zero_mem_smul_finset_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq β
inst✝³ : Zero β
inst✝² : SMulZeroClass α β
t : Finset β
a : α
inst✝¹ : Zero α
inst✝ : NoZeroSMulDivisors α β
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a t) 0) (Membership.mem t 0)
decl:
lemma zero_mem_smul_finset_iff (ha : a ≠ 0) : (0 : β) ∈ a • t ↔ (0 : β) ∈ t := by
  rw [← mem_coe, coe_smul_finset, Set.zero_mem_smul_set_iff ha, mem_coe]

name: Finset.zero_smul_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulWithZero α β
t : Finset β
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HSMul.hSMul 0 t) 0
decl: lemma zero_smul_subset (t : Finset β) : (0 : Finset α) • t ⊆ 0 := by simp [subset_iff, mem_smul]

name: Finset.Nonempty.zero_smul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulWithZero α β
t : Finset β
ht : t.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul 0 t) 0
decl:
lemma Nonempty.zero_smul (ht : t.Nonempty) : (0 : Finset α) • t = 0 :=
  t.zero_smul_subset.antisymm <| by simpa [mem_smul] using ht

name: Finset.zero_smul_finset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulWithZero α β
s : Finset β
h : s.Nonempty
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul 0 s) 0
decl:
/-- A nonempty set is scaled by zero to the singleton set containing zero. -/
@[simp] lemma zero_smul_finset {s : Finset β} (h : s.Nonempty) : (0 : α) • s = (0 : Finset β) :=
  coe_injective <| by simpa using @Set.zero_smul_set α _ _ _ _ _ h

name: Finset.zero_smul_finset_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : Zero α
inst✝¹ : Zero β
inst✝ : SMulWithZero α β
s : Finset β
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (HSMul.hSMul 0 s) 0
decl:
lemma zero_smul_finset_subset (s : Finset β) : (0 : α) • s ⊆ 0 :=
  image_subset_iff.2 fun x _ ↦ mem_zero.2 <| zero_smul α x

name: Finset.zero_mem_smul_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq β
inst✝³ : Zero α
inst✝² : Zero β
inst✝¹ : SMulWithZero α β
s : Finset α
t : Finset β
inst✝ : NoZeroSMulDivisors α β
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul s t) 0) (Or (And (Membership.mem s 0) t.Nonempty) (And (Membership.mem t 0) s.Nonempty))
decl:
lemma zero_mem_smul_iff :
    (0 : β) ∈ s • t ↔ (0 : α) ∈ s ∧ t.Nonempty ∨ (0 : β) ∈ t ∧ s.Nonempty := by
  rw [← mem_coe, coe_smul, Set.zero_mem_smul_iff]; rfl

name: Finset.smul_mem_smul_finset_iff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : MulAction α β
s : Finset β
a : α
b : β
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a s) (HSMul.hSMul a b)) (Membership.mem s b)
decl:
@[simp] lemma smul_mem_smul_finset_iff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • b ∈ a • s ↔ b ∈ s :=
  smul_mem_smul_finset_iff (Units.mk0 a ha)

name: Finset.inv_smul_mem_iff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : MulAction α β
s : Finset β
a : α
b : β
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem s (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) b)) (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul a s) b)
decl:
lemma inv_smul_mem_iff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a⁻¹ • b ∈ s ↔ b ∈ a • s :=
  show _ ↔ _ ∈ Units.mk0 a ha • _ from inv_smul_mem_iff

name: Finset.mem_inv_smul_finset_iff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : MulAction α β
s : Finset β
a : α
b : β
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) s) b) (Membership.mem s (HSMul.hSMul a b))
decl:
lemma mem_inv_smul_finset_iff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : b ∈ a⁻¹ • s ↔ a • b ∈ s :=
  show _ ∈ (Units.mk0 a ha)⁻¹ • _ ↔ _ from mem_inv_smul_finset_iff

name: Finset.smul_finset_subset_smul_finset_iff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : MulAction α β
s t : Finset β

ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset (HSMul.hSMul a s) (HSMul.hSMul a t)) (HasSubset.Subset s t)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma smul_finset_subset_smul_finset_iff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • s ⊆ a • t ↔ s ⊆ t :=
  show Units.mk0 a ha • _ ⊆ _ ↔ _ from smul_finset_subset_smul_finset_iff

name: Finset.smul_finset_subset_iff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : MulAction α β
s t : Finset β
a : α
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset (HSMul.hSMul a s) t) (HasSubset.Subset s (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) t))
decl:
lemma smul_finset_subset_iff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • s ⊆ t ↔ s ⊆ a⁻¹ • t :=
  show Units.mk0 a ha • _ ⊆ _ ↔ _ from smul_finset_subset_iff

name: Finset.subset_smul_finset_iff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : DecidableEq β
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : MulAction α β
s t : Finset β
a : α
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset s (HSMul.hSMul a t)) (HasSubset.Subset (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) s) t)
decl:
lemma subset_smul_finset_iff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : s ⊆ a • t ↔ a⁻¹ • s ⊆ t :=
  show _ ⊆ Units.mk0 a ha • _ ↔ _ from subset_smul_finset_iff

name: Finset.smul_finset_inter₀
initialProofState:

inst✝ : MulAction α β

⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a (Inter.inter s t)) (Inter.inter (HSMul.hSMul a s) (HSMul.hSMul a t))
decl:
lemma smul_finset_inter₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • (s ∩ t) = a • s ∩ a • t :=
  image_inter _ _ <| MulAction.injective₀ ha

decl:
lemma smul_finset_sdiff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • (s \ t) = a • s \ a • t :=

name: Finset.smul_finset_symmDiff₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1

inst✝ : MulAction α β

decl:
open scoped symmDiff in
lemma smul_finset_symmDiff₀ (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • s ∆ t = (a • s) ∆ (a • t) :=
  image_symmDiff _ _ <| MulAction.injective₀ ha

name: Finset.smul_finset_univ₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : GroupWithZero α
inst✝¹ : MulAction α β
a : α
inst✝ : Fintype β
ha : Ne a 0
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a Finset.univ) Finset.univ
decl:
lemma smul_finset_univ₀ [Fintype β] (ha : a ≠ 0) : a • (univ : Finset β) = univ :=
  coe_injective <| by push_cast; exact Set.smul_set_univ₀ ha

name: Finset.smul_univ₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : GroupWithZero α
inst✝¹ : MulAction α β
inst✝ : Fintype β
s : Finset α
hs : Not (HasSubset.Subset s 0)
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul s Finset.univ) Finset.univ
decl:
lemma smul_univ₀ [Fintype β] {s : Finset α} (hs : ¬s ⊆ 0) : s • (univ : Finset β) = univ :=
  coe_injective <| by
    rw [← coe_subset] at hs
    push_cast at hs ⊢
    exact Set.smul_univ₀ hs

name: Finset.smul_univ₀'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : GroupWithZero α
inst✝¹ : MulAction α β
inst✝ : Fintype β
s : Finset α
hs : s.Nontrivial
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul s Finset.univ) Finset.univ
decl:
lemma smul_univ₀' [Fintype β] {s : Finset α} (hs : s.Nontrivial) : s • (univ : Finset β) = univ :=
  coe_injective <| by push_cast; exact Set.smul_univ₀' hs

name: Finset.inv_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
⊢ Eq (Inv.inv 0) 0
decl: @[simp] protected lemma inv_zero : (0 : Finset α)⁻¹ = 0 := by ext; simp

name: Finset.inv_smul_finset_distrib₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
a : α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inv.inv (HSMul.hSMul a s)) (HSMul.hSMul (MulOpposite.op (Inv.inv a)) (Inv.inv s))
decl:
@[simp] lemma inv_smul_finset_distrib₀ (a : α) (s : Finset α) : (a • s)⁻¹ = s⁻¹ <• a⁻¹ := by
  obtain rfl | ha := eq_or_ne a 0
  · obtain rfl | hs := s.eq_empty_or_nonempty <;> simp [*]
  -- was `simp` and very slow (https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/issues/19751)
  · ext; simp only [mem_inv', ne_eq, not_false_eq_true, ← inv_smul_mem_iff₀, smul_eq_mul,
      MulOpposite.op_inv, inv_eq_zero, MulOpposite.op_eq_zero_iff, inv_inv,
      MulOpposite.smul_eq_mul_unop, MulOpposite.unop_op, mul_inv_rev, ha]

name: Finset.inv_op_smul_finset_distrib₀
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
a : α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inv.inv (HSMul.hSMul (MulOpposite.op a) s)) (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv a) (Inv.inv s))
decl:
@[simp] lemma inv_op_smul_finset_distrib₀ (a : α) (s : Finset α) : (s <• a)⁻¹ = a⁻¹ • s⁻¹ := by
  obtain rfl | ha := eq_or_ne a 0
  · obtain rfl | hs := s.eq_empty_or_nonempty <;> simp [*]
  -- was `simp` and very slow (https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/issues/19751)
  · ext; simp only [mem_inv', ne_eq, MulOpposite.op_eq_zero_iff, not_false_eq_true, ←
      inv_smul_mem_iff₀, MulOpposite.smul_eq_mul_unop, MulOpposite.unop_inv, MulOpposite.unop_op,
      inv_eq_zero, inv_inv, smul_eq_mul, mul_inv_rev, ha]

name: Finset.smul_finset_neg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : Monoid α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup β
inst✝ : DistribMulAction α β
a : α
t : Finset β
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul a (Neg.neg t)) (Neg.neg (HSMul.hSMul a t))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma smul_finset_neg (a : α) (t : Finset β) : a • -t = -(a • t) := by
  simp only [← image_smul, ← image_neg_eq_neg, Function.comp_def, image_image, smul_neg]

name: Finset.smul_neg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : DecidableEq β
inst✝² : Monoid α
inst✝¹ : AddGroup β
inst✝ : DistribMulAction α β
s : Finset α
t : Finset β
⊢ Eq (HSMul.hSMul s (Neg.neg t)) (Neg.neg (HSMul.hSMul s t))
decl:
@[simp]
protected lemma smul_neg (s : Finset α) (t : Finset β) : s • -t = -(s • t) := by
  simp_rw [← image_neg_eq_neg]; exact image_image₂_right_comm smul_neg
